mapper.select: select b.contentId, b.cateId, c.cateName, b.title, b.content, b.writer, b.writeDate from board as b join category as c on b.cateId = c.cateId order by b.contentId desc
mapper.insert: Insert into board ( cateId, title , content, writer ) values ( #{cateID}, #{title}, #{content}', #{writer} )
